   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Strompris api's documentation!
============================================
Fetches electricity prices in regions of Norway from the 
`'Hva koster str√∏mmen' <https://www.hvakosterstrommen.no/strompris-api>`_ api and 
visualizes them in a web application with adjustable configuration.

Create the webpage by running

.. code-block:: shell

   python3 app.py

Uvicorn will then give you a link in the terminal which you can go to in your browser.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   api.rst
